summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2001, for the improvement of 1st Avenue South, from the south margin of Spokane Street to the south margin of Dakota Street, which will connect with the proposed bridge of the Oregon & Washington Railway Company, by the construction of a pile bridge 26 feet in width, location of bridge to be as follows: west side of the bridge to be two feet from the west margin of 1st Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 20406 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
